headline.print_headline: Pressure Mounts for Apple to Expand Its Horizons
headline.main: Pressure Mounts for Apple to Expand Its Horizons

lead_paragraph: Apple reshaped technology and society when Steve Jobs unveiled the iPhone seven years ago. Now, the trend-setting company is losing ground to rivals that offer what Apple has stubbornly refused to make: smartphones with lower prices and larger screens than the iPhone.
